Tolkien-related events that took place in 1935.

content.title: March
content.content: 2 - British actor Stephen Thorne is born.

content.title: June
content.content:
11 - Father Morgan, the caretaker of Ronald and Hilary Tolkien, dies.
29 - Author Robert Giddings is born.

content.title: September
content.content: 16 - Animator Jules Bass, half of the Rankin/Bass production team, is born.

content.title: December
content.content: 24 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.

Januaryâ€“March - J.R.R. Tolkien becomes a member of The Society in Oxford.

? - Author Rhona Beare is born.
